After a long day of walking, this restaurant offered just the cozy, classy atmosphere that we needed for a warm, relaxing dinner.We waited in line for about 20 minutes to get a table, but it was well worth the wait.  Everything we ate was delicious.  My husband had a tuna steak, and I had the canneloni.  For dessert, I had the creme catalan, which set the standard for us for the rest of our trip around Spain.  The decor is cozy, with great lighting, warm colours, and a mix of styles that makes anyone (of all ages) feel welcome.  Definitely recommend!
